entities.description: The type of the variable in the dataset (e.g., numeric).
Description of the variable (e.g., 'Age of Arrestee - 3').
Age of individuals arrested as recorded in the dataset.
The count of occurrences for each age value.
Range of missing values specified in the dataset (e.g., -9, -8, -7).

relationships.description: Describes the type of variables contained in the dataset.
Provides a description of the variable in the dataset.
Records the ages of individuals arrested.
Indicates the unweighted frequency of arrests for each age.
Mentions the specified range of missing values for the variable.
